text: William Russell Robertson (June 17, 1853 – November 7, 1930) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia from 1899 to 1900 from the electoral district of Cowichan. ==References== Category:1853 births Category:1930 deaths Category:Members of the Legislative Assembly of British Columbia Category:People from the United Counties of Stormont, Dundas and Glengarry
title: William Russell Robertson
